31 Euros... are you READY?  2 AWESOME pizzas, a starter salad with tasty seasoned toast, a plate of delicious pasta (pesto with tomatoes), 3 desserts, 2 beers, 2 glasses of wine and a peach juice. 31 Euros!  Impossible you say? Well that was our lunch bill today.  Great service and top notch thin crust pizza.  I had the brie and spicy sausage and it was sublime - perfect crust.  The pasta while containing seemingly simple ingredients had layers of fairly complex flavors = great!   If you are going to the Sagrada Familia do yourself a favor and walk away from the crud immediately surrounding the church, walk a few minutes and find this place - you will be glad you did.
